targets.query:
from(bucket:"domoticz_home")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Usage-current" and r.idx == "1768")
  |> last()
SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."Percentage" WHERE ("idx"::tag = '9454')

from(bucket:"domoticz_home")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "Usage"
    and r.idx == "8023"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: spread, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))

from(bucket:"domoticz_home")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "Instant" and r.idx == "8023")
  |> last()
SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."Text" WHERE ("idx"::tag = '9453')
SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."Percentage" WHERE ("idx"::tag = '9454')
SELECT last("value") FROM "autogen"."Usage" WHERE ("idx"::tag = '9466')

from(bucket:"domoticz_home")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "Voltage"
    and r.idx == "9462"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)
  |> yield()
